data.name: Extract the email addresses
data.description:
# Problem

You team is holding a meeting at work for everyone in your large company.

Your boss asks you to get a list of all the guest's emails from the Google Calendar event. Google Calendar gives you the option to "Copy guest emails" from the event, however it comes in this format: 

```
Joe Bloggs <joe.bloggs@gmail.com>, Jane Doe <jane.doe@gmail.com>, ...etc.
```

Your boss specifically asked for a list of _just_ the guest's emails. Surely you can't spend time typing them out one by one - that would take forever!

Luckily you can code! Please complete the function to return a list of all the guest's emails

## Input

The input will always be a string with the format `first_name last_name <email_address>` separated by commas when there is more than one guest.

## Output

The output must be an array of strings containing the emails of every guest.
